drinks.instructions: Just put it together, fill with orange juice, add ice and drink it.
drinks.name: Jolly Jumper

drinks.instructions: Mix with cracked ice in a shaker. Serve in a chilled highball glass
drinks.name: Mudslide #1

drinks.instructions: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.
drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea #1

drinks.instructions: Mix one part of Midori (or equivalent melon liqueor) with one part of Orange Juice. Add a slash of Granadine Syrup.
drinks.name: Midori Sunrise

drinks.instructions: Shake after poured, add a cherry and slice of orange
drinks.name: Long Island Sunset

drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into shot glasses.
drinks.name: Stevie Ray Vaughn

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into a tall, narrow glass. Add a grain of salt.
drinks.name: Romulan Ale

drinks.instructions: Mix ingredients and serve over ice.
drinks.name: Malibu Bay Breeze

drinks.instructions: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.
drinks.name: Kool-Aid Shot

drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.
drinks.name: National Aquarium

drinks.instructions: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.
drinks.name: Damned if you do

drinks.instructions: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka
drinks.name: Long vodka

drinks.instructions: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream
drinks.name: Quick F**K

drinks.instructions: Add ingredients and mix in blender.
drinks.name: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge

drinks.instructions: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr. Pepper and beer
drinks.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper

drinks.instructions: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.
drinks.name: New York Lemonade

drinks.instructions: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!
drinks.name: Caipirissima

drinks.instructions: Put shot in then add Soda
drinks.name: Captain Do

drinks.instructions: Serve in rocks glass - no ice - Pour both liquors, fill with club soda, roll once Serve with straw
drinks.name: Southampton Slam

drinks.instructions: It's basiclly the same as the Cuba Libre but instead of Rum it has Pisco. You can use not only Coca-Cola, instead you can add almost any kind of other soda drinks (sprite, fanta, etc.)
drinks.name: Piscola

drinks.instructions: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass.
drinks.name: Pisco Sour

drinks.instructions: Mix hot chocolate according to instructions in a 12 oz. glass or larger and add liquors...top with whipped cream...beware!!!!! These sneak up on you!!!!
drinks.name: Mogul Masher

drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into shot glass and serve.
drinks.name: Prairie Fire #2

drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice then pour into martini glass
drinks.name: Chocolate Martini

drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass
drinks.name: Big Red

drinks.instructions: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass
drinks.name: Freight Train

drinks.instructions: Pour both ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass Take as a beer chaser when arriving late at the bar
drinks.name: Sicilian Kiss

drinks.instructions: Pour two ounces of whiskey and ounce of vodka on ice into a regular glass. Add three ounces of lemon-lime soda and a dash of orange juice. Serve and enjoy
drinks.name: Mister Wu

drinks.instructions: Pour two ounces of Yukon Jack over ice; add a dash of lime juice; enjoy
drinks.name: Snakebite #1

drinks.instructions: Mix the water and rum, add powdered lemonade mix to taste. Stir and enjoy!
drinks.name: The Shanaynay

drinks.instructions: Stir, pour into plastic cup and chug!!!!
drinks.name: The Saint Lawrence

drinks.instructions: Throw em all together and stir
drinks.name: Patmcpacke

drinks.comment: The ladies love this Cosmopolitan.
drinks.name: Superb Cosmopolitan

drinks.instructions: Dump out six ounces of beer, add vodka, fill up the rest of the beer can with water, mix and let settle
drinks.name: H-Bomb

drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients and stir for 5 minutes, allowing alcohol to settle.
drinks.name: Bearded Boy

drinks.instructions: Put in all alcohol first and water last, then salt
drinks.name: Instant Death

drinks.instructions: Throw all in a glass, light it: When flame goes down, chug but make sure you have a chaser, or your in trouble.
drinks.name: Flaming Huscroft

drinks.instructions: Drop shot glass of s.c. into lowball glass mixed with 7-UP and grenadine. Slam it!!!
drinks.name: Blood Clot #1

drinks.comment: Find a room with a soft floor and consume very fast. Great initiation drink.
drinks.name: Eat Hot Death

drinks.instructions: Mix the Vodka with the cider or the wine. Drop the fruit from a height of at least 3 feet. Pour the sprite and the Ginger Ale with the rest Carefully pour the Pisang Ambon into the punch. Enjoy!
drinks.name: Tuve Nightmare

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass with ice and enjoy.
drinks.name: Moscow Mule

drinks.instructions: With ice, shake/stir and serve in shot glasses. The original drink called for the Goldslager but I actually like it with HotDam better..
drinks.name: Oatmeal Cookie

drinks.instructions: Blend in shot glass. Serve.
drinks.name: Cowboy Cocksucker

drinks.instructions: Combine 4 alchohols and pineapple juice in cocktail mixer with ice. Shake well. Strain into shot glass. Enjoy. It'll get you flyin'!
drinks.name: Liquid Cocaine #1

drinks.instructions: Mix the ingredients in the blender with ice. Tastes like a chocolate shake. *Can add Bailey's to taste.
drinks.name: Kish Wacker

drinks.instructions: Served on the rocks. Pour the St. Hallvard first, then the aquavit. Add a lemon twist.
drinks.name: Shimmers

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingrediants together in a pitcher. Tastes and smells non-alcoholic, but packs a wallop.
drinks.name: Sip and go naked

drinks.instructions: Pour all inggredients in rocks glass(with silver polka dots on it if ya got one) Stir. Watch it fizz for thirty seconds Drink it fast
drinks.name: The Fuzzy Pissbomb

drinks.instructions: Mix it all in a glass 1/4 full of ice...
drinks.name: Piggelin #2
ingredients: 3 cl Midori melon liqueur (or Pisang Ambon)

drinks.instructions: Mix it in a glass 1/4 full of ice...
drinks.name: Piggelin #1

drinks.instructions: Pour the vodka in a glass 1/4-full off ice. Fill 2/3's of the glass with grape juice. Fill it up with the russian water. Ad just a little of grenadine.
drinks.name: Wobbler

drinks.instructions: Shake the spirits with ice and strain into a Highball. Fill with Grape Tonic and stir gently. Serve with a Lemon Slice on the Rim and a Straw. If you find the Grape Tonic too sweet, add a splash or two of Lemon Juice or Sour Mix. A Sour Bank is made in an Old Fashioned with two ice cubes and Grape Fruit Juice instead. A Southern Bank is a South Bank which has been added 1 part Southern Comfort.
drinks.name: South Bank

drinks.instructions: In a lowball glass combine the two and stir.
drinks.name: Dreamsicle #1

drinks.instructions: Mix ingredients in boston shaker with cracked ice. In a highball glass or champagne flute (optional), fill glass three quarters full with ice. Pour one tablespoon of cherry juice in glass before pouring in mixed ingredients. Garnish with two maraschino cherries and lemon wedge. Drink through a straw.
drinks.name: Midori Sour Ultra

drinks.instructions: Fill pint glass half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black  Tan.
drinks.name: Black & Tan

drinks.instructions: Squeeze juice from a fresh lemon. Mix with Koskenkorva.
drinks.name: Peltikatto

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a drinkmixer with ice cubes. Pour in a highball glass and fill up with ginger ale.
drinks.name: Maria's Delight

drinks.instructions: Layer in a shot glass.
drinks.name: Trial of the Century

drinks.instructions: Taste like a candycane layer these in the order listed to get a red green and white(clear) shot.
drinks.name: Santa Shot

drinks.instructions: Mix it all together on ice, what else?
drinks.name: Go Girl!

drinks.instructions: Mix well the Thunderbird with the Vodka and pour into an empty litre coke/lemonade bottle. The exact ratio of vodka:thunderbird can be altered to the creator's taste. Fridge for at least 12 hours. Donnington Brainstorm is best at temperatures between 2-4 degrees centigrade. If the drink is too cold it will tend to be too bitter; if it is too warm, it will tend to be too sweet. At just the right temperature, it should be light, refreshing, slightly peary and the alcohol taste minimal. Drink (with friends) VERY CAREFULLY.....
drinks.name: Donnington Brainstorm

drinks.instructions: Pour both into glass and keep away from open flames!!
drinks.name: Green Hell

drinks.instructions: Mix in a shaker, add some ice and shake very well
drinks.name: Alexandra

drinks.instructions: Layer in sequence.
drinks.name: Gingerbread Man

drinks.instructions: First add rum, followed by other ingredients, mix well. Serve on the rocks with an orange slice in a Collins Glass (approx. 14 oz.).
drinks.name: Love Juice (LJ)
ingredients: 6 1/2 oz Squirt (or any other citrus soda)

drinks.instructions: Put iced tea mix into glass and fill about half full of water.Add 2 ounces of rye, then fill remainder of glass with water.Stir.Add ice cubes.The colder this drink is...the better.
drinks.name: Kevin's special blend
ingredients: 2 oz Rye whiskey (Crown Royal or Gibson's finest)

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass with ice. Add cola to taste. Serve on the rocks.
drinks.name: Pirate's Float

drinks.instructions: Fill the shot glass about 3/4 full with Amaretto and top it off with enough 151 to make it burn. Put the shot glass in another glass and fill the new glass with beer (right up to the level of the shot glass). Light the Amaretto/151 and let it burn awhile. Blow it out (or leave it burning if you're brave) and slam it. Tastes just like Dr. Pepper.
drinks.name: Flaming Dr. Pepper #2

drinks.instructions: Add ingredents with ice and shake.
drinks.name: Screaming Nazi

drinks.instructions: Mix in order: rum, drop, Kaula, drop
drinks.name: Captain Louie

drinks.instructions: Free pour each ingredient into a test tube or shot glass
drinks.name: Horny Mohican

drinks.instructions: Rim tall glass with celery salt, fill with ice and ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick, straw, and lime.
drinks.name: Bloody Caesar

drinks.instructions: Pour vodka over ice, add kahlua and irish cream. Stir add 1 to 3 filbert nut(s).
drinks.name: Iron Butterfly

drinks.instructions: Layer equal parts in the order given. This is the ONLY way to make a B-52
drinks.name: B-52 #2

drinks.instructions: Serve as a shot or on the rocks.
drinks.name: Cherry Bomb

drinks.instructions: Serve as a shot or on the rocks.
drinks.name: Small Bomb

drinks.instructions: shake, strain into highball glass.
drinks.name: Toasted Almond

drinks.instructions: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!
drinks.name: Chocolate Milk

drinks.instructions: Put in large container (fu-cha bottle) with ice and shake vigorously. Drink rapidly. Buckets on hand would be advisable.
drinks.name: Fu-Cha
ingredients: 1 bottle Taboo, gin or Tia Maria

drinks.instructions: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52
drinks.name: B-53

drinks.instructions: In a LARGE pitcher, pour in 3 cans of beer, then the vodka and lemonade, then the last 3 beers. Mix gently and pour into a tall glass over ice. It sounds horrible, but the beer taste is hidden. It tastes like lemonade!
drinks.name: Strip and Go Naked

drinks.instructions: Pour rum, lemon juice, lime juice, and grenadine in a short collins glass. Shake or stir, then add splash of soda.
drinks.name: Shark's tooth

drinks.instructions: pour the peach schnapps into the shot glass, almost to the top. Slowly, and gently layer the Bailey's in on the side of the glass, to almost full. Add a touch of grenidine,down the middle and a touch of cherry brandy down the middle.
drinks.name: Brain Tumor

drinks.instructions: Mix 'em, garnish with a slice of lime (optional).
drinks.name: Spearmint Lifesaver

drinks.instructions: layered- bottom to top Kahlua, Bailey's, Canadian Club
drinks.name: Duck Fart

drinks.instructions: Shaken with ice.
drinks.name: Chocolate Monk

drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.
drinks.name: Rum Runner by Charles

drinks.instructions: Using a chilled cooper mug,fill with ice. Pour ingredients over ice. Garnish with sprig of fresh mint.
drinks.name: Bob's Moscow Mule

drinks.instructions: Obviously this is not a drink for a small glass. Shake with ice. Strain the mixture into a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry if you feel so inclined.
drinks.name: Caribbean Screwdriver

drinks.instructions: Mix all together, serve in a Collins glass over ice.
drinks.name: Chocolate Toasted Almond

drinks.instructions: Pour in Amaretto and Whiskey in a shot glass. Top shot with Everclear. Light shot on fire Drop in glass of beer Chug!!!
drinks.name: Flaming D-

drinks.instructions: Pour all the alcoholic ingredients in a highball glass, Stir Sour mix in a mixer and fill the glass.
drinks.name: Yellow Bird

drinks.instructions: you should never drink one of these.

Serve with salt and lemon as a usual Tequila shot. The first German Hooker was served under our graduation week in june 1994. Long live, Anders Hansson!! The technician class of 1994 Brinellskolan, Fagersta, SWEDEN

drinks.comment: Does not prevent or cure the common cold.
drinks.name: Cough Medicine

drinks.instructions: This is a great drink to serve on Halloween. First, pour the peach schnapps. Then, slowly pour the Irish Cream. Do not mix! The Creme will clump together and settle at the bottom of the schnapps. It will have the appearance of an internal organ!! Pour the grenadine over the Creme for a completely disgusting looking, yet thoroughly tasty party drink!
drinks.name: Brain Hemmorage

drinks.instructions: Pour the jigger of Midori first. Then, very gingerly, slowly pour the Irish Cream on top of the Midori. If done properly, the Irish Cream will sit on top of the Midori without mixing. Repeat the procedure with the Stoli over the Irish Cream. This will give you a very attractive three layer drink. Optional - add a teaspoon or so of Bacardi 151 on the top of the drink. Then, light the 151 and let burn for 5-10 seconds. Put out with a napkin. Shoot the drink and enjoy!
drinks.name: Extraterrestrial

drinks.instructions: Pour the Kurant into a highball glass full of ice. Add some Rose's lime (how much depends on individual taste). Fill up with Sprite.

drinks.instructions: Blend vodka, lime and sugar, top with soda water, serve in a higball glass.

Throw behind your back and catch with opposite hand. Repeat in various ways until your customers or guests are mystified. Serve in collins with out a garnish.

drinks.instructions: Pour schnapps into a large shot glass (the measurements may be off a bit, you can experiment). Slowly pour irish cream into schnapps so that it basically forms a "brain" in "formaldihide". Finally, dribble the grenadine (dribbling onto a spoon then into the schnapps helps) directly into the center of the irish cream mass . As the grenadine amount slowly increases it will eventually burst through the irish cream creating a "hemoraging" "brain".
drinks.name: Brain Hemorage
ingredients: 2 oz clear Schnapps of your choice

drinks.instructions: Used crushed ice. Can be made in anysizefrom punchbowl to personal serving.

This drink is created by Sami Taalas (Sheraton Malm, Sweden) Caribbean Kiss won Trois Rivires After Dinner Cocktail Competition Swedish Championship 1994

drinks.instructions: mix together in large container....stir in the alcohol from atart of list till the halls....for melted halls centers do the following...: use a needle and thread and put it through each halls..tie a knot after each one...place in 1 to 2 litres of boiling..and i mean boiling hot water until all are melted pour into bowl and mix in the water and raspberry juice. have fun should serve 10 to 20 people at 1 litre each we use this for our residence house drink ..it is safe and actually very tastey..try it and see.

drinks.instructions: Fill blender 3/4 with ice (small cubes best). Add a small splash of vodka, a small splash of Grand Marnier. Add a healthy serving of kahlua and a little less healthy splash of amarreto. Fill the blender with Bailey's until liquid is 1/2 inch from top of icecubes. Mix until smooth. Pour in hurricane glass and sprinkle some nutmeg on top! (Sorry about the vagueness. I learned this recipe while bartending in the Virgin Islands -- St. Thomas before it was demolished by Marylin. The drink is kick ass! The consistency should be like a milk shake, except without the milk. Also, this drink may be a bit expensive here (liquor is EXTREMELY cheap in the Caribbean)).
drinks.name: Bushwacker #2

drinks.instructions: pour rumple minze(should be pre chilled) into shot glass add jager(should also be pre chilled), serve

Add grenadine by tilting glass and pouring grenadine down side by flipping the bottle vertically very quickly. The grenadine should go straight to the bottom and then rise up slowly through the drink. Garnish stirrer, straw and cherry-orange.

Add some pineapple juice and a good splash of orange juice. Shake well. Add cherry and sprinkly nutmeg. Grab a staw and get ready! This was originally made in the Britsh Virgin Islands -- Pussers is the official rum of the Royal British Navy. Alter the amount of rum to your taste. Sorry about the inexact measurements -- that's the way we do it down in de islans mon!

drinks.instructions: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled
drinks.name: After Five

Twist the lime slice over the glass edge and stick a scallion in as a casual stirrer and delicious finish to the drink.

If making the sweet, you can also substitute olive juice for the cherry juice and garnish with a cherry.

On the mirror they have painted a pentagram, and it is served to a special song. The reason for this is, as they say: this drink is made out of pure evil. And if you watch closely in the mirror you're supposed to see the horns grow.

This is very good!

drinks.instructions: chill and strain into a shot glass
drinks.name: Sacrilicious

drinks.instructions: Shake ingredient vodka, lime and sugar with shaker. Add soda. Pour into Beer-pilsner with Ice. Drop curacao and creme de menthe. Decorate with cut-lime and cherry.
drinks.name: Secret Blue

drinks.comment: A very successful party drink, that everybody likes. Tastes like fruit juice more than alchohol. Careful as it goes to your head very quickly. Excellent when used for party games like coinage, etc.
drinks.name: Super Sangria
ingredients: 1 L Fruit juice (preferrably a Sangria fruit juice mix)

drinks.instructions: Into pilsner glass filled with ice cubes, first pour the melon liqueur, then the tequila, to create a green layer. Add sour mix. Slowly pour orange juice against side of glass to create the yellow layer. Add a few more ice cubes, if needed. Carefully float the sloe gin on top for the red layer. Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime wheels. Stir just before drinking.
drinks.name: Traffic Light Cooler

drinks.instructions: Pour Chartreuse into shot glass, and dash the Tabasco in. More Tabasco for a more venomous bite!
drinks.name: Snakebite (Aus)

drinks.instructions: Add the coffe first , then add alchohol and finally you should add the sugar. Shake well :c)
drinks.name: Sjarsk

drinks.instructions: Pour Jager at bottom of glass. Mix Crown, Everclear,  151 separately to layer on top of the Jager. Splash the Grenadine. Attempt to shoot  SHUT THE HELL UP.
drinks.name: Shut the hell up

drinks.instructions: Shot of Sloe Gin, add half ounce Southern Comfort, fill with orange juice, float Galliano.
drinks.name: Sloe comfortable screw against the wall

drinks.comment: Tastes just like root beer!
drinks.name: Root Beer Barrel

drinks.instructions: Mix all ing. over ice, strain and serve! Tastes like a sweet tart!
drinks.name: Smarty

drinks.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.
drinks.name: Sex under the boardwalk

drinks.instructions: Chill  strain.
drinks.name: The Lunchbox

drinks.comment: after a couple of these, you'll know what's it's like... havin' a RONI!!!!!
drinks.name: The Roni

drinks.comment: Great beach drink. Changes colors as you add ingredients. Ride the wave, don't get caught up in it!
drinks.name: Green wave

drinks.comment: Hisashi Kishi, N.B.A., Japan 1. I.B.A.s I.C.C., Tokyo 1996 -- Category: Long Drink
drinks.name: Milky Way
ingredients: 3 cl Amaretto di saronno (ILLVA Saronno S.p.a.)
Fill up 3 cl fresh Pineapple juice

drinks.comment: Jarl Ahvenainen, F.B.S.K., Finland 1. I.B.A.s I.C.C. London 1956. Category: Pre Dinner.
drinks.name: Cardicas

drinks.comment: Variations: Add 7-Up
drinks.name: Pucker

drinks.comment: One of the house drinks at Sports Fans, A bar and nightclub where I work in Washington, D.C.
drinks.name: The Liver Transplant

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients except lime in a cocktail shaker, then shake, and pour into glass. Add lime.
drinks.name: Fuzzy Ethan

drinks.comment: measurements are approximate. Invented when I was having dinner with a friend and we decided to experiment.
drinks.name: What She's Having

drinks.instructions: Stir Vodka and Grenadine with ice. Fill in Champagne-flute without the ice. Fill up with champagne.
drinks.name: Feel like holiday

drinks.comment: This is the best drink I have ever had.
drinks.name: SD Special

drinks.instructions: mix all ingredients in glass and enjoy!!
drinks.name: Satin Angel

drinks.instructions: Pour the vodka and anisette into the glass and top it off with orange juice.
drinks.name: Jenny's Concoction

drinks.instructions: Fill vodka and Pisang in the glas. If you tihnk it's to strong you may fill in with more pisang. Fill then with orange juice and sprite, about half of each till the glas is filled. Take then a twist or two of lemon.
drinks.name: Rafu Eighteen

drinks.comment: Even proportions are essential!!
drinks.name: Nuts and Berries #2

drinks.instructions: Combine Creme de Banana, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice  ice in mixing tin. Shake or flash blend. Strain over ice and float Midori. Garnish with watermelon wedge.
drinks.name: Coppertone Punch

drinks.instructions: Put the ice cubes in first then add the shots in the order that they're listed.
drinks.name: Fatkid on the Rocks

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a collins glass over ice (if a 32 oz. glass is available double all the ingredients), mix in a shaker and serve with a cherry. Should taste like the old chalky lollipops that cam on a hard plastic stem!!!!
drinks.name: Sweet-tart Lollipop

drinks.instructions: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.
drinks.name: Kool-Aid Slammer

drinks.instructions: Mix Rumple Minze and Jgermeister in an iced shaker and strain into shot glass
drinks.name: Liquid Heroine

drinks.comment: A great night starter. Dont forget that this is a shot so it must go down in one gulp. Feel it oooze.
drinks.name: Oil Slick #2

drinks.comment: Tastes like mouthwash! (For Americans, think of mint flavored Zima (For others, Zima is a malt beverage that tastes like alcoholic soda))
drinks.name: Scope
ingredients: 1 glass Ginger ale, Tonic or Soda

drinks.instructions: Fill the glass about two thirds full of Sprite. Pour in the Schnapps, then gin. Put ice in glass to cool.
drinks.name: Gin Blossam

drinks.instructions: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!
drinks.name: Kurant Tea

drinks.comment: A very sweet drink. Very popoular in Stockholm, Sweden.
drinks.name: Superfly

drinks.instructions: Pour tequila, peach schnapps, and sweet  sour over ice. Add grenadine and stir slightly. The drink should fade from yellow to red. You can also put ingredients in a blender with ice for a frozen version.
drinks.name: Peach Margarita

drinks.comment: I prefer this version over the original. You can drink it like punch.
drinks.name: Ultimate Margarita

drinks.comment: Sometimes referred to as the "Crack Lady".
drinks.name: Cocaine Lady

drinks.instructions: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top
drinks.name: Dirty Nipple

drinks.instructions: Add 4 ice cubes to old-fashioned glass. Pour 2 ounces of vodka over the ice. Add 15 dashes of peychaud bitters. Stir.

drinks.comment: This drink is the chapter-drink of the Phi Alpha Delta, Law Fraternity International. It was created by members of the Ford Chapter of Loyola Law School in Los Angeles, California. It is particularly enjoyable with a strong, sweet tasting cigar!
drinks.name: The District III

drinks.instructions: First you mix the alcohol into the glass with ice in it. Next you pour Sprite and Farris at the same time into the glas. At last you the drops from lime comes and you serve it with a slice of lime on the side.
drinks.name: Black River

drinks.comment: Can substitute tequila for vodka, or Strawberry Liqueur for cordial if unavailable (but it's not as good....)
drinks.name: Salisbury Special

drinks.comment: Tastes just like a tootsie roll.
drinks.name: Tootsie

drinks.comment: Invented by Mr. Deming from Maine.
drinks.name: Dick Deming Martini

drinks.comment: When served, the drink will taste like coke, but it'll sneak up on you so watch how much you drink. Serve in a standard plastic party cup with ice.
drinks.name: Die ruhige Sturm

drinks.comment: This drink vas invented in Molde during the jazz festival, and has its name from the inventor.
drinks.name: Darkwood Sling
ingredients: 1 part Soda water or tonic water

drinks.instructions: Mix alcohol, then juice and tonic water. Add crushed ice and drink.

drinks.instructions: Fill the glass with Tequila then add Tabasco sauce carfully, put on a top with whipped cream and add some salt on it.
drinks.name: Headcrush

drinks.instructions: Basically, toss the Rum  Vodka together and stir gently. Next, pour in the orange juice . Shake well. Pour over ice.

drinks.instructions: Mix tequila and kahlua in a whiskey glass and serve with lotsa ice...

drinks.instructions: Put the two shots into frosty beer mug. Add IBC Root Beer into glass. Ice cubes are optional.

drinks.comment: Serve as long drink.
drinks.name: Dephaekt

drinks.instructions: Put ice in glass Pour in vodka Add splash of Sour Mix Half fill with cola Half fill with 7-Up Roll drink to remove fizz Drink!

drinks.instructions: Just put the ingredients in a shot glass and put a little bit of whipped cream on the top.

drinks.instructions: Mix as normal, pour in shot glass, and set on fire. Put it out any way you want.

drinks.instructions: Fill glass with Icecubes, pour all ingrediences into glass. Garnish with orange slice.

drinks.instructions: Put the tabasco sauce in the bottom of a shot glass, pour equal parts Absolut Peppar and Everclear 190 then add salt. Set on fire and serve.

drinks.instructions: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !

drinks.instructions: Mix in the lemonade with the Bacardi Limon. If it is a good lemonade you're using you can mix as much as half  half and not be able to taste the rum.

drinks.comment: A nasty disquesting drink. But it's a party hit

drinks.instructions: Put in punch first, then add everclear. For added flavor, soak the fruit wedges in everclear about an hour ahead of time. Fruit wedges make excellent snack. Best served in ice chest or jantorial trash can for mass comsumption.

ingredients: As many wedge Fruit as you like

drinks.comment: I use Jose Cuervo Margarita mix in place of lime juice

drinks.instructions: Shake with ice in cocktail shaker. Strain into cocktail glass.

drinks.instructions: shake with ice. pour into glass.

drinks.comment: Warning: DO NOT BREATH WHEN DRINKING!! This highly alcoholic drink should be revered. Failure to pay the dragon proper respect will result in nausea at the least and alcohol poisoning at the next least.

drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a glass (larger than 12 oz.). Put a lid over the glass. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds.

drinks.instructions: just mix, shake and pour.

drinks.instructions: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!

drinks.instructions: Shake  Strain.

drinks.instructions: Put all ingredients in shaker together with some ice-cubes. Shake well. Serve with piece of banana on top of the glass.

drinks.comment: If you live in Norway you should use a particular kind of beer. It is called AKA PILSNER and is sold in shops called AKA!

drinks.instructions: Pour 2 cl Galliano into a shot glass, float 2cl hot filter coffee over it and top with lightly thickened cream as to create three layers.

drinks.instructions: Mix. Then drink. Repeat as necessary.

drinks.instructions: layer in order given, splash 151 on top light on fire, sprinkle cinnamon on top to produce sparks instead of just a flame
drinks.name: Bailey's Comet #2

drinks.instructions: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain into glass.

ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Cuervo premium or Gold tequila
3 oz Sweet and sour (FRESH lemon juice with equal parts simple syrup)

drinks.instructions: shake vigorously
drinks.name: A.D.M. (After Dinner Mint)

drinks.instructions: mix in shaker over ice...strain into glass(es)

drinks.instructions: Drop shot glass with banana  melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

drinks.instructions: fill up the shaker with ice and put the ingredience in it. Shake it until it gets frosty on the outside. Before you start shaking,put icecubes in the glass and fill it up with water so the glass is cold when you have shaked the drink. Take the icecubes and water out of the glass,and fill the glass again vith icecubes and pour the drink in the glass.

drinks.instructions: put alchohol in shot glass, drop strawberry into glass, then try and make cream float on top.

drinks.instructions: pour all spirits in the shaker ...  top with a splash of pineapple juice
drinks.name: Illusion

drinks.instructions: Pour vodka, gin and creme-de-menthe over lots of ice.
drinks.name: Earthquake #2

drinks.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender. Mix until smooth. Garnish with fresh of frozen berries.

drinks.instructions: Mix in blender until smooth. Garnish with slice of orange.

drinks.instructions: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

drinks.instructions: combine ingredients in mug and stir until fizzy

drinks.instructions: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

drinks.comment: Very similar to Caipirinha, this drink is, however, less high on sugar, and therefore, slightly bitter. The old-fashioned French orange liquor made sexy by Argentinian party girls. Supposedly the official Argentinian party girl drink.
drinks.name: Zizi Coin-coin

drinks.comment: I invented this drink when I went down to Daytona a little after bike week. The place was deserted, but cheap! I wanted something tropical and ordered pineapple juice with Malibu Rum. It wanted something to round it out and I asked for a shot of banana liquor to be added. Moments later I came up with a name (the bartenders hadn't heard of this drink before) - Banana Cream Pi, that's what it tastes like Banana, Cream, for Coconut cream, Pi for the Pineapple.
drinks.name: Banana Cream Pi

drinks.comment: If vanilla stoli isn't availible use vanilla flavor or vanilla liqueur.

drinks.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain. Serve as a shooter.

drinks.instructions: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

drinks.instructions: Pour in Rum and then triple sec. Next pour in OJ and Pinapple. Grab that Gary.

drinks.instructions: combine all liquor in full glass of ice. shake well. garnish with orange and cherry

drinks.instructions: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

drinks.comment: It taste pretty smooth for having 151  101 mixed.

drinks.instructions: Hurricane glass filled with ice add ingredients shake cherry and orange garnish

drinks.instructions: Small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass

drinks.instructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass
drinks.name: Alien Secretion #2

drinks.instructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass
drinks.name: Southern Blues

drinks.instructions: Collins glass filled with ice add ingredients up to sour mix shake fill with Jgermeister
drinks.name: Darth Vader

drinks.instructions: Fill glass with ice and fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. DO NOT STIR!!!!! Serve well chilled.

drinks.instructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Add o.j. and Midori and give a little stir.
drinks.name: Alligator

drinks.instructions: Add a few cubes of ice to glass and then add Midori and Bacardi. Fill the rest of the way with the soda and give a little stir.
drinks.name: Crocodile

drinks.comment: Kazuhiro Takagai, N.B.A., Japan 1. I.B.A.s I.C.C. Tokyo 1996 -- Category: After Dinner
drinks.name: Sweet Heart

drinks.comment: Bjrn Brandberg, F.B.S.K., Finland 4. I.B.A.s I.C.C., Danmark 1958 -- Category: Pre Dinner
drinks.name: Gege

drinks.comment: G.Brandberg, F.B.S.K., Finland 3. I.B.A.s I.C.C. 1962 -- Category: Pre Dinner
drinks.name: Finn Roses

drinks.comment: Jaroslav Krtk, C.B.A., Czech-Republic 1. in International Bartenders Associantions Intenational Cocktail Competition, Tokyo 1996. -- Category: Pre Dinner
drinks.name: Lady Scarlett

drinks.comment: Charles Nyberg, F.B.S.K., Finland 1. Wodka Wyborova-competition 1972
drinks.name: Scanex

drinks.instructions: Combine the water and lemonade mix, following the directions on the lemonade mix. Add everclear and absolute vodka. Then add the lemon slices and shake to mix. serve cold

drinks.instructions: Put in iced shaker and mix well, strain in to a Highball glass
drinks.name: Passcack Valley Orgasm

drinks.instructions: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

drinks.instructions: shake ingredients and pour over ice...

drinks.instructions: Fill glass half way with vodka, fill rest of way with Zima. Then add the lime juice (Rose's Lime Juice works best). Now stir and add the slice of lime.
drinks.name: Sweets to the Sweet

drinks.comment: A very powerful weapon against hang-overs.

drinks.instructions: Just mix them!!!

drinks.instructions: Pour an half ounce of Blue Curacao into shot glass. Follow with quarter of an ounce of Vodka. (Try and use Smirnoff) One table spoon of lime juice. Then fill rest of glass with sprite.

ingredients: Fill rest of glass Sprite or 7 up

drinks.instructions: just pour the alcoholic ingridents in a shot glas and when you done that squeze a little amount of lime juice on top

drinks.instructions: Build all ingrediants in a collins glass, cover, shake and serve
drinks.name: San Diego Seabreeze

drinks.comment: You can substitute cream for the Baileys and you can substitute hazelnut liquor for the frangelica.

drinks.instructions: Mix each ingredient in a glass. Tilt glass 180 degrees and slam it!

drinks.comment: Delicious drink typical of southern Peru. Reputed to increase fertility.
drinks.name: Leche de Monja
ingredients: One or more whole Egg with shells
Lime juice or lemon-lime juice (to cover eggs)

drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients into mixing cup with ice. Shake and strain into double shot glass. Drink soon after pouring before liquors separate.

drinks.instructions: Just Dump 'EM All In A Glass  Mix 'Em All Up.
drinks.name: The Dragon

drinks.instructions: Layer ingrediants in order listed above. Then squeeze lemon over layered ingrediants. Be sure to mount lemon wedge on side of glass or place in glass.

drinks.instructions: Pour Kahlua in shot glass then with a spoon slowly pour Irish Cream into the shot glass on top of the Kahlua then pour the 151 Rum with the Spoon slowly on top of the Irish Cream then light on fire.. Blow out Flame Before Drinking!

drinks.instructions: Mix it all over ice, strain into shot glass.

drinks.comment: It is better to mix this one in bulk. It does not matter if it is mixed or not so to make things easier mix equal amounts of J.D., Goldschlager, and Tequila in a large bottle and add about a shot to a shot and a half of Tabasco. Wath out this drink was properly named!
drinks.name: Satan's Revenge

drinks.comment: In this recipe i suggest a good strong peppermint scnapps like ICE 101. I also suggest that you do not add any cream or sugar, but if thats the way you must take your coffee, be my guest. Enjoy...
drinks.name: Psycho Joe

drinks.comment: This shooter is actualy rumored as being the official shooter of Hell. Enjoy...
drinks.name: The Pernod Demon

drinks.instructions: Put ice in bottom of glass. Slowly pour Baliey's Irish Cream over ice Next pour in milk and then stir gently. Add more to taste. For chocoholics add Hearshy's Chocolate sauce.

drinks.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a cherry.
drinks.name: El Presidente Cocktail #2

drinks.instructions: Pour Goldschlagger into a shot glass. Add a splash of Tabasco sauce. Drink and run for water.
drinks.name: Golden Furnace

drinks.instructions: Stir and serve neat. Add a cherry.
drinks.name: Sancho Panza

drinks.instructions: make it an ample size shot!!
drinks.name: Freddy Kruger

drinks.instructions: Float Goldschlager on top of Rumple and enjoy!
drinks.name: Gold Baron

drinks.instructions: Float schnapps on top of Rumple and enjoy!
drinks.name: Red Baron

drinks.instructions: put two scoops ice-cream in blender add liquor and blend until like a milk shake.
drinks.name: Golden Star

drinks.instructions: Mix in shot glass, it's that simple. Use more Tabasco for more fire, less for more alcohol.
drinks.name: Forest Fire

drinks.instructions: serve with ice. fresh pressed juice tastes best.
drinks.name: Vodka Orange

drinks.instructions: combine with ice in shaker strain into cocktail glass
drinks.name: Firehammer

drinks.comment: This drink was told to me by a Spring Breaker who had learned about it in Tampa, FL. It is a good drink so I thought I would pass it along. .
drinks.name: Italian Ice #2

drinks.instructions: Put 1/3 chocolate syrup, then 1/3 Jgermeister, and then 1/3 Butterscotch of the glass.
drinks.name: Luftwaffe

drinks.instructions: Pour Midori into a hurricane glass over ice, add Vodka, Pineapple juice, then float cranberry juice.

drinks.comment: Drink may be consumed with a straw while on fire (use EXTREME caution), or may be extinguished before consumption.
drinks.name: Concord

drinks.comment: My parents discovered this drink while on vacation in Hawaii. They enjoyed it there and brought the recipe home for us to try! So enjoy this delightful drink in the sun and feel as though you were in Hawaii too :) Aloha!
drinks.name: Lava Flow

drinks.instructions: Add cranberry juice to gin and pour into shot glass.

drinks.instructions: Pour Chambord and Vodka over ice. Fill to top with pineapple juice. Garnish with purple grape and pineapple slice.
drinks.name: Purple Crayon

drinks.instructions: Layer all ingredients and light on fire to warm. Blow out flame and drink in one gulp.
drinks.name: Feel The Burn

drinks.comment: You may add more than one can of pepsi to the drink, depending on your tastes. If you prefer coke to pepsi, then you can use it as a substitute. Ice may need to be added if you are a slow drinker. This drink goes especially well with
drinks.name: Vanilla Vargas

drinks.comment: Coke may be replaced with Pepsi, and more may be added for taste. More ice may also be added to keep it cold. Excellent for drinking games.
drinks.name: Golden Cola

drinks.instructions: Add the three rums and the Midori in highball glass with ice. Add a little Sour mix for flavor and fill the rest with pineapple juice. It's a nice light green color. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

drinks.instructions: Put them all together and mix it with a lot of ice. For big parties use more of each and mix in a garbage can.

drinks.instructions: small shaker with ice add ingredients stir strain into shot glass
drinks.name: Smashing Pumpkin

drinks.comment: Be careful when lightning up the rum, and wait until it extinguishes, before pouring the contents of the shaker. or else the optical effect will not be that noticeable.
drinks.name: Caribbean Smoked Torch

drinks.instructions: Layer in order into a shot glass.
drinks.name: Bubble Gum

drinks.instructions: Serve over ice in a tall glass

As for the taste, you can not taste the alcohol!! It tastes just like Lemonade, with a surprise at the end of the night.

Unfortunately, he does not touch alcohol, so he will probably never taste it. Still, it was an instant success for everyone else attending the party. If you have any comments, suggestions or anything else-do mail me.

Maximum effect with bass heavy dub reggae in the background

drinks.comment: It's name has a reason

drinks.comment: Very strong shot. Hits like an atomic blast.

ingredients: 1 dash grape and apple Fruit syrup consentrate

drinks.instructions: First and foremost, BUY A NEW GARBAGE CAN, and wash it out thoroughly!!!!! (Preferably the big ones 40-55gal). First Pour in all of the Grain (10 bottles of 1.75ml [Handle]), keep in mind that this recipie is for a Large Party, not 10 people sitting around getting loaded.....Anyway, next add the dry packets of mix. We used to get the largest industrial bags we could, don't go for quality, you're not going to remember anyway. Now this is the most critical part, the fruit. This is why I put this on here...any joker can make punch, but I figured I would distibute my years of fruit research for free....the Best friends you have in the Fruit community are the Orange and the Apple. This is because they absorb the grain better than anything else I tested. So make sure you get some of these in every glass you get, and eat them, DON'T EVER THROW THESE OUT, this is the best part of the drink. Bananas suck, they get gushy, watermellon works ok but the seeds get to be a pain in the ass when you can't see so well, pineapple is good, basically you get the point. Cut the fruit into wedges and throw it in the mix and let it sit around for a minute...Now throw in the bags of ice and fill it up to desired potency with water, mixing can be done with a canoe paddle or a 2x4 or anything else you've got lying around...a disposable camera is usually a good partner while drinking this concoction, people get really outta hand and go off the deep end.....This goes well as an iceblock shot too.
drinks.name: Grain Punch

The ice should effectivly mellow the drink and you will find that the Makers Mark and Coca-Cola complement one another very well. Sweeter than a "Jack and Coke".
drinks.name: Mark and Coke

drinks.comment: Made this when completely drunk at a staff party (after consuming alot of Tequila) I loved it but had to spend the next week trying to figure out what had gone into it! Once made you will see why I called it the mud slide. It looks horrible but just ignore it and drink (through the straw) ENJOY!!!!
drinks.name: Mudslide #3

drinks.comment: Served at Norm's Beer and Brats, Superior, WI. Grenadine is poured into the mouth of a plastic shark, which is then placed tail-down in the drink. When patron is seated, they remove the shark and plunge it head-first into the vodka/lemonade mixture. Gives a nifty "blood" effect. Very sweet drink. Use caution with the straw, or the vodka will lay you out.
drinks.name: Shark Tank

drinks.instructions: Pour around 2-3 oz. of Whiskey into a glass, then fill the rest up with Vernors.
drinks.name: Monkey Spanker

drinks.comment: The smooth raspberry kamakazie.
drinks.name: Raspberry Kamakazie

drinks.instructions: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.
drinks.name: Moranguito

drinks.instructions: First put the tequila, then the vodka, then the black rum, then the Bailey's Irish Cream, then the Granadine syrup and then mix this five elements for that the drink become pink, to finish put the Absinthe with the help of a spoon. Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw, or you have another choice: When the shot is on fire you slap it to extinguish the fire and then you drink it.
drinks.name: Pedra (stone)

drinks.comment: For an out of this world green drink, you have to try this.
drinks.name: Kryptonite kooler

drinks.comment: I only make this in the blender, so my measurements are somewhat crude. It's usually just made to taste. It is an excellent party drink and a favorite of ALL my female friends.
drinks.name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour

drinks.comment: Pleases women. Makes men bold. Serves 2.
drinks.name: Liquid Courage

drinks.comment: The Agua de Valencia come from Valencia (Spain). Is a typical drink for the hollidays, specially for the populary fiesta "Las Fallas". We it drink very cold. In groups and is perfect for to offer the happiness Mediterranean.
drinks.name: Agua de Valencia

drinks.instructions: Mix together in a Tom Collins glass the vodka, tequila, schnapps, Grand Marnier and lime juice over ice. Fill with orange juice.
drinks.name: Psycho Citrus

drinks.instructions: Mix together Kahlua, schnapps, vodka, ice-cream and cola until blended. Fill with milk.
drinks.name: Fucked up Float

drinks.instructions: Place gin or vodka, triple sec, vermouth, grenadine and ice in shaker. Shake well and pour into glass. Fill with tonic water or club soda.
drinks.name: Johnny Cat
ingredients: Fill with Club soda or tonic water

drinks.instructions: Pour all ingredients with an ice cube into a shaker.
drinks.name: Green Zone

drinks.instructions: Mix the Vodka with Rose's Lime then stir. Fill up with Tonic Water.
drinks.name: Robert says: MASS

drinks.comment: This will taste like a delicious raspberry soda. Make sure you use a decent champagne but don't waste your money on expensive stuff. However I strongly recomend using Chambord. I know it hurts $$$ but the other (cheaper) brands never taste as good.
drinks.name: Milk of Amnesia
ingredients: 1-2 jigger Chambord raspberry liqueur to taste

drinks.comment: Great Summer Drink.
drinks.name: Jack Frost

drinks.instructions: Fill Collins Glass with ice Pour in Blue Curacao first Next pour in Sloe Gin but be careful, the appearance of the drink is very important. Pour gently onto the ice so as to layer it. Next fill it with cream also layering it. The result should be a blue and red drink with tendrils of white shooting through the colors.
drinks.name: Born on the 4th of July

drinks.comment: Posted in The Webtender Forum by Damian J. White.
drinks.name: Toblerone #1

drinks.instructions: Pour eveything in a big punch bowl or cooler with a big block of ice. Throw in some cherries and a half bottle of 151 for good measure. Have a good time!
drinks.name: Sunburn

drinks.instructions: Shake with lots of ice, strain into glass
drinks.name: Snake in the grass

drinks.comment: This is one of those drinks to sip on a long summer night, enjoying the sunset and having a few laughs. Enjoy!
drinks.name: Bigger better Blue Lagoon

drinks.instructions: Mix ingredients, the shot should taste like a piece of French Toast.
drinks.name: French Toast

drinks.instructions: Mix a normal glass of vodka and fanta lemon, drink down to half and fill up with beer and coke.
drinks.name: The Icelandic way

drinks.instructions: Mix Well. Drink. Repeat until stupid.
drinks.name: Raspberry Stupid

drinks.comment: This drink is named after a very good Laser Quest player. His player name is Goat.
drinks.name: Flaming Goat

drinks.instructions: Mix gentle, and add ice cubes. Serve whith Straw.
drinks.name: Spring

drinks.comment: I give this drink to everyone on thier 18th birthday when they're already drunk. It's spicy, it burns, and it's swe-eet.
drinks.name: The Graveyard

drinks.comment: A very popular cocktail in the CROWN CASINO, Melbounre Australia. Definatly a winner :)
drinks.name: Toblerone #2

drinks.comment: if you want to vary the drink it goes basically 2 parts vodka, 3 parts apple, and 3 parts orange juice. virtually no alcohol taste but when mixed properly packs one helluva wallop.
drinks.name: Screwdriver (modified)

drinks.comment: Tastes fruity but packs a punch. A great summer drink.
drinks.name: Roadrunner Punch
ingredients: Fill with Fruit punch, berry flavour is best

drinks.comment: For many drinks, mix in a punch bowl. -- Women enjoy the fruity flavor of this drink..(Malibu Rum has a coconut flavor). It does not have a strong alcohol taste and is a great pool side drink.
drinks.name: Rum Runner

drinks.comment: This libation is best made with Bombay Sapphire.
drinks.name: Ginelico

drinks.comment: Try it, has good rep among new customers.
drinks.name: Blitz

drinks.instructions: Stir it together until it just looks like Bailey's.
drinks.name: Orgasm a la Denmark

drinks.instructions: Stirr it together until it just looks like dark Bailey's.
drinks.name: More Orgasms

drinks.comment: So named because anyone who would order one is clearly a horse's ass.
drinks.name: Horse's Ass

drinks.comment: Very popular amongst UN soldiers in FYROM area.
drinks.name: H.D.

drinks.instructions: Get a big mug. Pour in one ingredient then the other.
drinks.name: Horse Jizz

drinks.instructions: First, have all the ingridients cold. Mix the liquor in a glass and then add the iced tea, coca-cola and lemon. Be sure to stir or shake. Serve chilled in a big (beer?) glass.
drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea #6

drinks.instructions: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass
drinks.name: Cowboy Cocksucker #2

drinks.comment: Enjoy -- One catch, no hands allowed.
drinks.name: Blow Job #3

drinks.comment: This drink was invented by my friends, Nathan Smith and Dave Calam. Dave said "let's make a blue drink" and the rest is history. It's evil because it tastes like candy but packs a big alcoholic punch! It's a great drink, if a little on the expensive side.... The taste is like those orange ovation chocolates, only better (less orange).
drinks.name: The Evil Blue Thing

drinks.instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!
drinks.name: Shark Attack

drinks.comment: Drink slowly and enjoy!
drinks.name: Jack's Vanilla Coke

drinks.comment: Serve to patrons who have temper tantrums.
drinks.name: Viscous Robert

drinks.comment: Amazing tastes like a strawberry milkshake.
drinks.name: The Pink Drink

drinks.comment: Very refreshing on a hot summers day...or night.
drinks.name: Sid's Special
ingredients: 1 tblsp frozen Lime juice concentrate (Minute Maid)

drinks.comment: This is what we drink at the bar crawls in D.C. and Philadelphia. If mixed well and kept on ice the vodka is not noticed. It is easy to drink several eight ounse party cups and not notice the affect coming on. We call it tripwire because of the fact tht you don't perceive your impending drunkeness until it hits you suddenly and you fall over!
drinks.name: Tripwire
ingredients: Fill with 3 1/2 - 4 gal ice cold Water

drinks.comment: My friends and I love White Russians and tequila shots...so we figured why not combine both!!!! The word ambidextrious means "able to write with both hands" at once, so ambiJAXtrious means able to get "jacked up" with two drinks at once!!!! hee, hee!
drinks.name: Ambijaxtrious

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Let stand for 3-5 minutes to chill. Pour into shot glass and enjoy.
drinks.name: Mutated Mothers Milk

drinks.comment: For a party, 1 bottle tequila to 1 gallon apple juice
drinks.name: Apple Grande

drinks.comment: A great summertime cooler with a unique flavor!
drinks.name: Amer Picon Punch

drinks.instructions: Dissolve the sugar in the boiling water and chill in the fridge. This step is best done before the party/drinking session. Put the tequila and lemon juice in the pitcher and fill with soda water and ice. Then mix sugar syrup to taste.
drinks.name: Tequila Press

drinks.comment: I invented this because I don't like the flavor of the new product. All my freinds like the taste because it's smooth.
drinks.name: Bleeding Surgeon

drinks.comment: Nobody has ever heard of this drink away from Penn State (Cafe 210 West). If you like Gin and Tonics. . . you'll love a K.C. Ice Water.
drinks.name: Kansas City Ice Water

drinks.comment: If you can't find lemon gin, regular gin and some lemon juice might work as well.
drinks.name: Jen's Mountain Gin

drinks.comment: (RED YELLOW GREEN... BLACK OUT)
drinks.name: Suicide Stop Light

drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice and stir.
drinks.name: Spikey Hedgehog

drinks.instructions: Chill all ingredients well. Mix equal parts and serve in a cordial glass. Or, if you have a test tube or beaker handy, go for it!
drinks.name: Epidural

drinks.comment: Danger: not for beginners !!
drinks.name: Magic's Tornado

drinks.comment: This is a popular and pretty drink that I learned while staying in the Cayman Islands. It looks nice when served and it tastes great! A wonderful "island" drink.
drinks.name: Cayman Sunset

drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain into cocktail glass
drinks.name: Applejack

drinks.instructions: add ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain
drinks.name: Hazelnut Martini

drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients over ice and pour into highball glass. No garnish.
drinks.name: Algae

drinks.comment: If you got the guava, this is good stuff
drinks.name: Island Girl

drinks.comment: Vary the amount of Jack Daniels depending on how the strength of the drink desired.
drinks.name: Sensei on the Rocks

drinks.instructions: Fill blender cup with 15 ounces of small ice cubes, add rum, passion fruit syrup and sweet and sour and blend until smooth, in a hurricane glass pour the blended strawberries, then add the blended mixture, the strawberries will ooze up the sides of the glass and it will look like a beautiful sunset. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.
drinks.name: Sweet Sunset

drinks.comment: Hold on to ya shorts!!
drinks.name: Suicide The Shot

drinks.instructions: Stir sugar and vodka together. Add milk. Serve cold with a straw.
drinks.name: The Power of Milk

drinks.instructions: Full collins glass with ice, pour in Limon, add sweet and sour, fill with equal parts club soda and 7-up
drinks.name: Pedro Collins

drinks.comment: Try it warm during the winter months.
drinks.name: Bitchin' Apple Cider

drinks.instructions: Pour over ice. Shake and strain into shooter glass.
drinks.name: Apple Cider Slider

drinks.comment: Careful while drinking!
drinks.name: Adam Bomb

drinks.comment: A drink that is well worth-while. Can top off a good night of getting plastered.
drinks.name: Three Wise Men (on a farm)

drinks.instructions: Add liquors and mixers into shaker with a few cubes of ice. Shake vehemently and strain out ice. Serve as a shooter.
drinks.name: Royal Scandal

drinks.instructions: Combine first five ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Shake. Pour into a Collins glass and top with 7-Up.
drinks.name: Purple Motherfucker

drinks.comment: I got this out of Cheers magazine, and I happened to know the guy it is named after. He owns a few really snazzy joints in San Francisco, but he's from southern Idaho like me. Happy cocktailing :-) P.S. It is very important that it is Bombay Sapphire ... So says the creator.
drinks.name: Harry Denton Martini

drinks.comment: Whilst sipping this cocktail through the lips there should be a sensation of a thicker, slimey liquid going into your your mouth and down your throat.
drinks.name: Sizz Snot

drinks.comment: * If Tequila Rose can't be found (it's an awesome creamy strawberry flavored tequila) you can improvise by using 1/2 shot Tequila and 1/2 shot Bailey's Irish Cream. -- This is one of my Original Drinks, it began at a small little tavern in Delaware where I worked. It was a local favorite and the bar still uses it.
drinks.name: MVP's Strawberry Bomb

drinks.instructions: Chill mug, add ice, pour Sprite and juice into mug. Then add rum and Southern Comfort. Finally add the 5th element: Everclear!
drinks.name: The 5th Element

drinks.instructions: Stir with a butter knife
drinks.name: Jo Jo

drinks.instructions: Pour Crown in first...Then the Kahlua, and Float the Baileys on top. Then Slam!
drinks.name: Duck Fart #2

drinks.comment: Just the shot to warm up your insides !!!!
drinks.name: Arizona Antifreeze

drinks.comment: Go ahead and call a cab before you shoot this one!
drinks.name: Purple Elastic Thunder Fuck

drinks.comment: Make sure you have a bar rag handy for fast clean-ups!
drinks.name: Perfect Flaming Dr. Pepper

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients into glass. Enjoy.
drinks.name: Extreme Valentine

drinks.comment: Goes down smooth--but WATCH OUT!
drinks.name: Dirty Oatmeal

drinks.comment: You may have to add more or less sugar depending on how sweet it tastes.
drinks.name: Venom

drinks.instructions: Shake over ice, Strain and pour.
drinks.name: Lay Down and Shut Up!

drinks.comment: Makes a great drink also.
drinks.name: Sax with T.

drinks.comment: This is great at parties. Women especially like it because it is not too harsh and has a pleasing taste to it. But careful! Beause you cannot taste the vodka or rum very well, it goes down very easy. Its easy to get drunk on this stuff.
drinks.name: Tropical Orgasm

drinks.instructions: Add a few ice cubes and fill the glass with ginger ale
drinks.name: Be Sweet

drinks.comment: It tastes just like Bubble Gum and my guests like it for an easy shot.
drinks.name: Bazooka Joe

drinks.instructions: Build in shot glass. Float Bailey's in amaretto and top with 151. The Bailey's should float in the middle.
drinks.name: Stormcloud

drinks.comment: Inspired by the late, great Elvis Presley. All Hail Commander Thorn!
drinks.name: Velvet Presley

drinks.comment: This a great drink after a hard day at the office, or a grueling game of volleyball enjoy!
drinks.name: Gin-Dew-It

drinks.comment: These drinks are great! 2 of them is like a 6 pack. You can easily slam 4 or 5 before you even start to feel the effects, so watch out. They will catch up to you.
drinks.name: DewRunRum

drinks.comment: Hope y'all have fun with my drink, I invented it on a New Years Party 1995 in Germany (Oberndorf to be exact!).
drinks.name: Sunny Sex

drinks.comment: After 2 or 3 of these-You won't know what hit 'Ya !
drinks.name: Tattooed Love Goddess

drinks.comment: Summer drink. Garnish with anything other than onions or olives. Fruitopia's "Mind over Mango", while a tasty beverage, is not as good a mixer as it may seem. Stick with the real.
drinks.name: Mind over Marny

drinks.instructions: Put the milk into a glass and put the Pisang ambong into it also. Shake and serve it cold with ice cubes.
drinks.name: Pisang cold

drinks.comment: Developed by the Naked Fish Restaurants in Boston, MA. Voted America's Most Sensual Cocktail by Penthouse Magazine.
drinks.name: Latin Love
ingredients: 1 oz Coco Lopez Cream of coconut

drinks.comment: If you want to, you can spice it up a bit ( in terms of alcohol, that is ) by putting in 1 msr. of Jamica Rum... Enjoy

drinks.comment: Also good with Rum instead of Vodka...
drinks.name: Murder in the Forest

drinks.instructions: In a shot glass, float .5oz. lt. cream on top of .5oz. rootbeer schnapps.
drinks.name: Rootbeer Floatie

drinks.comment: CAUTION: This drink is extremely alcoholic and quite flammable! Do NOT expose to open flame and drink responsibly! NOTE: If you're not one of the few that enjoys the sensation of white-hot liquid crawling down the back of your throat then you might want to consider "Romulan Ale Light". Simply follow the directions listed above and, when you're ready to imbibe, pour the shot in to a 12-ounce glass and fill with Sprite. Variations include strawberry soda, pineapple soda, orange sode, Cherry 7-Up, and grape soda. Remember, you haven't had REAL Romulan Ale until you've sucked down a shot!
drinks.name: Real Romulan Ale

drinks.instructions: Pour all 3 into a shot glass and away you go.
drinks.name: Kamikaze #2

drinks.comment: I prefer Henrys for the rootbeer (cold) and the Guinness warm and flat. I have used other beers and for me stouter is better. Porter works. You may vary the 50/50 proportions to taste. One of the most charming traits of this drink is the disgusted looks you get when you order it.
drinks.name: Black and Brown

drinks.instructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in shots. Fill with Sour Mix.
drinks.name: A Piece of Ass

drinks.instructions: Pour over crushed ice and stir or can be blended.
drinks.name: Green Eyes

drinks.instructions: Shake and strain, into rocks glass.
drinks.name: Three-Legged Monkey

drinks.comment: Remember that I warned you...Don't drink more than 4-5 of these or you are in BIG trouble the next morning! A.K.A. Jen's Rum Punch (Ft. Lauderdale/Palm Bch., Florida)
drinks.name: The Shiwala

drinks.comment: Cute drink for girls, or people who like drinks with funny names.
drinks.name: Sex With An Alligator

drinks.instructions: basically put ice in glass, add 1 oz. southern comfort, then fill glass with mountain dew and enjoy!

drinks.comment: Tell your moms not to drink this shit!!!!

drinks.instructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

drinks.instructions: Mix Galiano, Coca-Cola and ice. Float cream on top by pouring over the back of a spoon which is just touching the top of the Coke mixture.

drinks.comment: Named for the red/green color combination when poured correcly (and after my dog Rosebud) Nice for presentation - vodka/lime juice/triple sec: green floats on pink grapefruit juice like a blacktan. still looking for the proper garnish
drinks.name: Rosebud

drinks.comment: Rich Man's Slippery Nipple
drinks.name: Golden Nipple
ingredients: Fill remainder with Bailey's irish cream

drinks.comment: After a hard day at work, cool down with this Swedish specialty.
drinks.name: Painter's Delight

drinks.instructions: In a collins glass with ice, pour vodka, midori, and raspberry schnapps. Add a splash of lime juice. Fill 2/3 with sour mix and the rest with soda water (or seltzer). Stir gently, and finally top with a splash of grenadine.

drinks.comment: Great hangover killer
drinks.name: Boom box

drinks.instructions: mix it together and hurl it down

drinks.instructions: Pour Jgermeister in shaker over ice. Fill with coke and shake til your arms are sore. Pour into glass and top with a smidgen of Bacrdi 151. If your feeling mean, feel free to light it!

drinks.comment: Drink it like a soft drink, preferrably through a straw. Tastes like a smooth, non-alcoholic peach soft drink.

drinks.instructions: Mix all ingredients together and shake!!!!

drinks.comment: This drink comes from Denmark, and is very popular in Djursland, the nose of Denmark.
drinks.name: Winegum

drinks.comment: B-52 must be lighted!!! These ingredients are used in Switzerland.

drinks.instructions: Shake all ingredients and serve in shot glass.

drinks.instructions: Fill a glass with ice. Pour first 3 three ingredients then adjust pineapple juice to taste. Suck it down:)

drinks.comment: For a powerful kick, add 1 oz. gin  1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur to your SkyLab. The raspberry should be added to the already mixed drink.(The purple looks great against the turquoise drink!) Beware..two will knock you off yours!!

drinks.comment: This mixture came about when my friend and I had way too much 100proof Vodka and only Orange mixers. Be carefull with this stuff tho: if mixed properly, the lack of alcohal taste can be misleading!

drinks.instructions: shake like hell whith some ice
drinks.name: Sex on the Beach #10

drinks.instructions: Add some ICE Put in the shaker Shake your ass off
drinks.name: Rikkertje

drinks.instructions: Add some ice. Twist and shake that thing. Serve at once.

drinks.comment: 8 of these and you're so drunk that you can't remember anything the next day.

drinks.instructions: Layer the butterscotch schnapps and Irish Cream by pouring the Irish Cream over the back of a spoon. Spray the Whipped cream on top, pile it about 1-2 inches high. This shot must be taken without using your hands. Pick up the shot glass between your lips and tilt back.

drinks.comment: Can also be made with light creme de cacao, but is much better with dark.

drinks.instructions: Add 1 shot of After Shock to 8 oz cup of hot chocolate and enjoy.

drinks.instructions: Add wormwood to shot of pernod add sugar and water serve over ice.

drinks.instructions: Pour both ingredients together and mix well. Serve cold.
drinks.name: Diablo's Blood

drinks.comment: feel the heat of the dragon's breath, but please extinguish flame before downing this shot.......enjoy
drinks.name: Dragon's Breath

drinks.comment: Great look!! But the taste is only average
drinks.name: Green Milkshake

drinks.comment: Has a very smooth, cooler-like taste and is sure to please the ladies. From Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Compliments of Lisa.
drinks.name: Schnapp Pop

drinks.comment: The first one is awful. By the third you will be begging for more. There won't be a fifth

drinks.comment: I know it seems a tad theatrical but bar customers do love the whole ritual of cocktails like this and it may sound strange but it is actually a very pleasant tasting drink.

drinks.comment: Drink this and die.
drinks.name: Death Wish

drinks.comment: English drink for all ages.

drinks.instructions: mix all ingrediants into a shaker filled with ice, then strain out drink into shot glass
drinks.name: Otter Pop

drinks.comment: The fruit will hide the taste of the wisky. The flavor of the whisky mixes perfectly with the fruit.

drinks.instructions: Fill glass half way with ice. Pour in 1 oz. of creme de banane and then 5 oz. of pink lemonade.

drinks.comment: Using a blender will work. Just don't blend it too long so you end up with a slush.
drinks.name: Golden Margarita

drinks.instructions: pour into shot glass
drinks.name: Dolt Bolt

drinks.comment: Named after it's creator and his infatuation with getting drunk quickly.
drinks.name: Richie 50

drinks.comment: Smoothest shot I've ever had.
drinks.name: Lube Job

drinks.instructions: Place all drinks into glass and add ice-cream at the end.
drinks.name: Iceberg in Radioactive water

drinks.instructions: add all with ice shack and strain

drinks.comment: Drink all at once through the straw, like a Mind Eraser for those anti-Kahlua folks. A friend of mine came up with the idea and became fairly popular. Easy to drink, not terribly strong.
drinks.name: Zipperhead

drinks.comment: A fruity, tropical experience for everybody to enjoy!
drinks.name: A Gilligan's Island

drinks.comment: This drink will get you VERY drunk in no time!!!
drinks.name: Danger

drinks.comment: Smells bad, tastes worse. If someone pukes after drinking this, you'll know where the name comes from.
drinks.name: Terror From the Deep

drinks.instructions: You can either drink this one the rocks or frozen. Salt to taste.
drinks.name: Purple Margarita

drinks.comment: Very good drink with/without the lime. Most prefer without the lime.
drinks.name: Grapefruit Teaser

drinks.instructions: shake with ice garnish with with strawberry on glass,with another summer berry held on with toothpick
drinks.name: Berrynice
ingredients: 60 ml Fruit juice of mixed berries

drinks.instructions: Mix in the order mentioned. You can use what ever kind of cognac, and vodka you prefer.

drinks.comment: The ingredients list 4 oz of pineapple juice, but you'll probably never use that much in 1 drink (more like 2 oz). The best drink for hot summer nights, and ladies love this drink!
drinks.name: The Nog

drinks.instructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

drinks.comment: This drink was accidentally discovered by 5 drunken college students who had nothing better to do. Rum can also be replaced by vodka if desired.
drinks.name: The Pineapple Drink

drinks.comment: Absolutely great. Haven't struck out yet with this drink. Guarenteed results after the second pitcher, for the averege crowd, as for you lush ones, seek help.

drinks.instructions: It's real easy. Drop the shot of Sake into a glass of beer and the just SLAM IT !!!!!!!!!!

drinks.instructions: Fill a highball with ice, add the vodka, lemon juice and cran. Garnish with a lemon wedge and serve.

drinks.comment: Invented this summer -97 on the party island Ios in Greece. A real party drink wich has a real good effect if you have problem to get in the mood

drinks.comment: Originally called a Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster, I developed it in the latter days of my high school in Bangkok. My friend and I experimented with many drinks. Another good one is an "Apple Pie with a Crust"

drinks.comment: You can substitute just about anything for the blue curacao and white sambucca, as long as they flame. A mixture of blue and red Galliano Sambucca makes a particularly good looking drink. Try adjusting the colour to suit your customer. Ask customer "what's your favourite colour?", and make it that colour. Great for birthdays and similar celebrations. If you're soft, you could probably do it without the chatreuse.

drinks.instructions: Garnish with jalapeno pepper.

drinks.comment: Serve straight up, on the rocks, or as one hell of a shot

drinks.comment: This shot is for those gung-ho fuckers that think they can drink anything, a few of these, heavin' is believin'. Have fun. Don't get scared. (In San Antonio lingo: don't puke.)

She couldn't think of a name, but her favourite expression that evening was "puleeeze, like i'd sit on your face" (she was rather inebriated). And so the name was born, "sit on my face mary jane".

drinks.comment: I developped this drink for females because many do not like the hard alcohol and the mango madness Snapple hides it. The lime also helps disguise the booze in this nice drink. Please E-mail me and tell me what you think! tonycv@hotmail.com

drinks.instructions: dump the shots in glass then fill with oj to taste

Erika and Heather were at Erika's empty house (litterally) preparing for a party. After many shots we came up with something that we both enjoyed. Combining our names Er-Hea-d : Airhead. Enjoy!

drinks.comment: You must shake well or else the coconut parts in the pina colada will sift and drop down in the glass, leaving the drink undesireable to drink.

drinks.instructions: combine in shaker. shake vigorously. strain into cocktail glass

drinks.comment: Very well recieved cocktail for "ladies night out".

drinks.instructions: Add Ice-cream last. Enjoy!

drinks.comment: Orgin of The Angry German: Named after Geneva, Illinois native Scott Hallahan. While at Beloit College, Scott was nicknamed Hans Gruber by Beloit Collge alum Eric Emery, due to excess swearing and threats of violence. At last count, Scott has appox. 26 different nicknames (including 'The Angry German). The drink was created at Bert's Other Place in Beloit, Wisconsin on July 10, 1997. The Angry German should taste like your least favorite cough syrup.
drinks.name: The Angry German

After this: relight the glass and sniff again. cheers!

drinks.comment: The Bernardete was created during one of the very famous sessions of Antares, a very well known and respected jazz club in Lleida, Spain during Christmas of 1996. It quickly expanded all over Spain and it is very usual to see it being served in the most prestigious clubs of Spain. Perfect drink for coloquial sessions where one needs to be aware of the conversation yet desires to have a nice touch of alcohol running through the veins. Wonderful drink created by fantastic people!!! Visca Lleida i l'Antares!!
drinks.name: Bernardete

drinks.comment: Drink this one fast...don't taste test...just shoot it down then you'll know what it feels like to be stabbed in the guts by an ancient Japanese Warrior...Domo Arigato...

drinks.comment: Well it was Halloween Night I was working (being the Rookie). I shaved my head and all my facial hair and I dressed up as Buhhda.Anyway some really hot chick asked me to make a Witches Brew. Me being a Rookie I didnt know how to make it. So to impress this girl I flew around the Bar I work at picking up every dark looking liquior trying to make something that looked and tasted cool. Then Pow she dark it and asked me "what the Hell was that??" and it just came out "Booda's Black Brew" I said. She licked her lips and says "Damn give me another!!" Then all her Fine little friends came and asked me for some Booda's Black Brew!!! And So a Drink was Born. I work at the Ale House and Raw Bar in FL and I have been called Booda for Years now so everything fit into place.
drinks.name: Booda's Black Brew

drinks.comment: An alternative known as a "Shiver Shot" involves the shot glass being held between the breasts rather than in the drinker's hand. The salt is placed on the breast. The drinker licks the salt, tips the glass over into his/her mouth, then sucks on the lemon.
drinks.name: Tequila Body Slammer

drinks.instructions: Begin with gentle fruit juices. Put a little less than 1 pint orange juice and the juice of 2 or 3 lemons into a half-gallon or gallon jar. Before squeezing the lemons, peel the rinds very thinly and add them as well. -- Add 2 quarts rum. Cover and let stand for three days. -- Put 2 pounds sugar into 1 quart water and bring to boil. Add the sugared water to the rum and fruit juice, cover, and let stand for two weeks. Then strain and bottle.
drinks.name: Shrub

drinks.instructions: Put into gallon or half-gallon jar the spirits, thin lemon peel, orange juice, and sugar. Now take the essence of bitter almonds (you can use any amount you please) and add it to the glass of milk. Mix thoroughly and pour into the jar. Cover, put in a warm place (65-70 degrees fahrenheit), and keep it there until the milk has curdled. This takes from one to three hours. Then filter through filter paper and bottle. Rest it for two weeks before drinking it.
drinks.name: Almond Shrub

drinks.comment: It is a fine drink on a cold day, and you can use it a week after you have made it.
drinks.name: Rum Shrub

drinks.comment: Can also be shaken.

drinks.instructions: Lay shot glass in a CLEAN ash tray right side up, and start to pour the drinks into te glass till they overflow into the ash tray. then light the liquer on fire, blow it out, take the shot from the shot glass, then drink out of the ash tray. ENJOY

drinks.name: Notre Dame Pick-Me-Up

drinks.comment: If you want to drink this outside (the way it should be), use a sports cup instead of a mason jar. This is best enjoyed while watching some sort of outdoor, college music concert. I usually mix acording to color, the lighter the weaker. Overall, this is a very sweet drink.
drinks.name: Redneck

drinks.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour Vodka, Brandy and Cranberry. Squeeze Lime.
drinks.name: Dirty Bastard

drinks.instructions: Pour each ingredient one at a time. Rum first, then JD, and finally SoCo.
drinks.name: The A-Rock

drinks.comment: I highly recommend using "Red Pop" soda instead of fruit punch.
drinks.name: Poop Shoot

drinks.comment: This drink was created by the people who live at the Ski and Outdoor House at York College of Pennsylvania. The type of glass is not important-just as long as you can drink from it!!
drinks.name: Tight Snatch

drinks.comment: This is a very good drink that will make you very drunk without even knowing you are drinking alcohol!
drinks.name: The Lowee

drinks.comment: Makes a great breakfast drink during the holidays. Don't be scared off by the egg, it is really a great drink!
drinks.name: Silver Fizz

drinks.instructions: Mix all drinks in a blender, You can add 8 cubes of ice to chill the drink and give it more of a body. Add the Hot melting butter(or the schapps right before you drink). Makes enough for at least 10 people.
drinks.name: Deer Killer
ingredients: 6 oz Jack Daniels (or other premium sourmash Whiskey)
30 shots Jgermeister (Substitute Sambuka if you wish)

drinks.instructions: Throw all ingredients into a blender, and blend to your hearts delight. After, pour into an iced punch bowl and drink immediately!
drinks.name: The Chalise
ingredients: 1 pint Fruit punch (any type will do)

drinks.instructions: Add all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth.
drinks.name: Multiple Orgasm Cajun Style

drinks.comment: This drink is a taste sensation to be reckoned with. Created on a late night by some college students.
drinks.name: Apple and Cinnamon Joy

drinks.comment: This drink was created late at night, by some college students.
drinks.name: Golden Coke

drinks.instructions: Pour Absolut and Cointreau over ice in glass. Squezze and drop in lime to taste.
drinks.name: Kamakazie #2

drinks.comment: Can also be used as a mixed drink.
drinks.name: Baby Aspirin

drinks.comment: This was one of those late-in-the-party-what-can-we-make-with-what's-left kind of drinks, but it turned out surprisingly well!
drinks.name: Candy Apple

drinks.instructions: Just mix and serve chilled.
drinks.name: Jolly Rancher #2

drinks.instructions: Mix equal parts of all.
